name: Acidic Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: This permanent deals 2 damage to target creature or player."
flavor: The first sliver burst against the cave wall, and others piled in behind to deepen the new tunnel.

name: Amok
text: {1}, Discard a card at random: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: Crovax's rage was horrifying. Within moments only blood and shreds of flesh remained of the shapeshifter.

name: Awakening
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, untap all creatures and lands.
flavor: "There are times when destiny calls forth a people and demands an action. Now is the time. We are the people. This is our action. Charge!"\n—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Bandage
text: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Takara shook with guilt. She knew the last image her father had seen was her sword flashing toward him.

name: Bottomless Pit
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player discards a card at random.
flavor: "I'm sure it came with the place. I don't think you build one on purpose."\n—Gerrard

name: Brush with Death
text: Buyback {2}{B}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B}{B} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nTarget opponent loses 2 life. You gain 2 life.

name: Bullwhip
text: {2}, {T}: Bullwhip deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature attacks this turn if able.
flavor: "Pain is a crude way to enforce obedience, but it is cheap and plentiful."\n—Volrath

name: Burgeoning
text: Whenever an opponent plays a land, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: "The plants said, ‘We will fight the stone with root and stem and seed. We are patient. We will win.'"\n—Skyshroud myth of the forest

name: Calming Licid
text: {W}, {T}: Calming Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {W} to end this effect.\nEnchanted creature can't attack.

name: Cannibalize
text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Exile one of those creatures and put two +1/+1 counters on the other.
flavor: "Mine."

name: Carnassid
text: Trample\n{1}{G}: Regenerate Carnassid.
flavor: The hunter would never forget the time or place where he first met the carnassid, for they buried him there.

name: Change of Heart
text: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nTarget creature can't attack this turn.

name: Cloud Spirit
text: Flying\nCloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.
flavor: Clouds are the soil, dreams are the crop.\n—Kor saying

name: Constant Mists
text: Buyback—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nPrevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Contemplation
text: Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 life.
flavor: "How fascinating it is to watch the machinations of one's own mind play themselves out."\n—Volrath

name: Contempt
text: Enchant creature\nWhen enchanted creature attacks, return it and Contempt to their owners' hands at end of combat.
flavor: "Predictable little man. In all these years you taught me so much yet learned so little."\n—Volrath, to Starke

name: Conviction
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+3.\n{W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.
flavor: It was not the minotaur's shoulders but his soul that bore the heaviest weight.

name: Convulsing Licid
text: {R}, {T}: Convulsing Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {R} to end this effect.\nEnchanted creature can't block.

name: Corrupting Licid
text: {B}, {T}: Corrupting Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {B} to end this effect.\nEnchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

name: Craven Giant
text: Craven Giant can't block.
flavor: What is high as a mountain and low as a snake?\n—Dal riddle

name: Crossbow Ambush
text: Creatures you control gain reach until end of turn. (They can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: There is no drake that flies faster than a crossbow bolt.\n—Vec saying

name: Crovax the Cursed
text: Crovax the Cursed enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Crovax. If you don't, remove a +1/+1 counter from Crovax.\n{B}: Crovax gains flying until end of turn.

name: Crystalline Sliver
text: All Slivers have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
flavor: Bred as living shields, these slivers have proven unruly—they know they cannot be caught.

name: Dauthi Trapper
text: {T}: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor: Merfolk tell their young of Dandân, humans of Rag Man. Dal tell tales of the Dauthi, and they are far worse.

name: Death Stroke
text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor: For a sharp second, Selenia froze, and Crovax's blade found home. As the angel shattered like glass, Crovax felt his mind collapse—the curse had been fulfilled.

name: Dream Halls
text: Rather than pay the mana cost for a spell, its controller may discard a card that shares a color with that spell.
flavor: Within without.

name: Dream Prowler
text: Dream Prowler can't be blocked as long as it's attacking alone.
flavor: "To think that some find sleep a restful state."\n—Volrath

name: Duct Crawler
text: {1}{R}: Target creature can't block Duct Crawler this turn.
flavor: "The mountain's ducts will be like organ pipes, amplifying the glorious roar of the dying."\n—Stronghold architect, journal

name: Dungeon Shade
text: Flying\n{B}: Dungeon Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: A sickness stirs in its eyes, a nightmare born in darkened wails.

name: Elven Rite
text: Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.
flavor: As the bough stretches, so shall you grow. As the roots spread, so shall you thrive.

name: Endangered Armodon
text: When you control a creature with toughness 2 or less, sacrifice Endangered Armodon.
flavor: These are its last days. Its doom to be remembered only until the hunters hunger again.

name: Ensnaring Bridge
text: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.
flavor: "I expected a fight, but I didn't expect it from the building itself."\n—Gerrard

name: Evacuation
text: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor: The first step of every exodus is from the blood and the fire onto the trail.

name: Fanning the Flames
text: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nFanning the Flames deals X damage to target creature or player.

name: Flame Wave
text: Flame Wave deals 4 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.
flavor: "I hear the roaring of a wave whose waters are red and whose mists are black."\n—Oracle en-Vec

name: Fling
text: As an additional cost to cast Fling, sacrifice a creature.\nFling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
flavor: It's raining rats and moggs.

name: Flowstone Blade
text: Enchant creature\n{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Remember the fable of the elf who came upon a cave of gold. In trying to free the largest piece, she was crushed by its weight."\n—Karn, silver golem

name: Flowstone Hellion
text: Haste\n{0}: Flowstone Hellion gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Volrath leaves no stone untrained.

name: Flowstone Mauler
text: Trample\n{R}: Flowstone Mauler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Once these horrifying creatures were perfected, there was no need for armodons.

name: Flowstone Shambler
text: {R}: Flowstone Shambler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Flowstone troops are notoriously difficult to keep in formation.

name: Foul Imp
text: Flying\nWhen Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.
flavor: The imp, unaware of its own odor, paused to catch its breath . . . and promptly died.

name: Furnace Spirit
text: Haste\n{R}: Furnace Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: If it can survive the Furnace, you don't want it near you.

name: Gliding Licid
text: {U}, {T}: Gliding Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {U} to end this effect.\nEnchanted creature has flying.

name: Grave Pact
text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
flavor: "The bonds of loyalty can tie one to the grave."\n—Crovax

name: Hammerhead Shark
text: Hammerhead Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor: Cross the eyes of a hammerhead and you'll dot its teeth.

name: Heartstone
text: Activated abilities of creatures cost {1} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.
flavor: "Finding a true heartstone is even harder than finding a true heart."\n—Hanna

name: Heat of Battle
text: Whenever a creature blocks, Heat of Battle deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor: "Takara, it's me!" shouted Starke. It was no use—she obeyed Volrath.

name: Hermit Druid
text: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.
flavor: Seeking the company of plants ensures that your wits will go to seed.

name: Hesitation
text: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice Hesitation and counter that spell.
flavor: Gerrard hesitated, looking up at the enemy ship. The future hesitated with him, changed forever by the pause.

name: Hibernation Sliver
text: All Slivers have "Pay 2 life: Return this permanent to its owner's hand."
flavor: Mogglings have been known to play ball with hibernating slivers, completely unaware of their true nature.

name: Hidden Retreat
text: Put a card from your hand on top of your library: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by target instant or sorcery spell this turn.
flavor: After an hour in the hidey-hole, Squee seriously pondered the advantages of danger over boredom.

name: Honor Guard
text: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "It is not a choice I make, to have this guard. It is the choice of my people, and my duty to them."\n—Oracle en-Vec

name: Horn of Greed
text: Whenever a player plays a land, that player draws a card.
flavor: "Rath grows, and I am nourished."\n—Volrath

name: Hornet Cannon
text: {3}, {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying and haste named Hornet onto the battlefield. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Intruder Alarm
text: Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.\nWhenever a creature enters the battlefield, untap all creatures.
flavor: Mirri was startled by Volrath's apparition—it had no scent.

name: Invasion Plans
text: All creatures block each turn if able.\nThe attacking player chooses how each creature blocks each turn.
flavor: Gerrard studied the globe as Mirri kept watch. Suddenly, his eyes widened. "This is Dominaria!"

name: Jinxed Ring
text: Whenever a nontoken permanent is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, Jinxed Ring deals 1 damage to you.\nSacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Ring. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Lab Rats
text: Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nPut a 1/1 black Rat creature token onto the battlefield.

name: Lancers en-Kor
text: Trample\n{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Lancers en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor: Nearly all sets of Kor twins are trained as lancers.

name: Leap
text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Mirri leapt quickly and silently. The guard died likewise.

name: Lowland Basilisk
text: Whenever Lowland Basilisk deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
flavor: Unlike their cousins, Rathi basilisks turn their victims into puddles of flowstone.

name: Mana Leak
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor: "The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy."\n—Volrath

name: Mask of the Mimic
text: As an additional cost to cast Mask of the Mimic, sacrifice a creature.\nSearch your library for a card with the same name as target nontoken creature and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Megrim
text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor: "You can run from your pain," explained Gerrard to Crovax, "but take it from experience: you will tire before it does."

name: Mind Games
text: Buyback {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nTap target artifact, creature, or land.

name: Mind Peel
text: Buyback {2}{B}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B}{B} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nTarget player discards a card.

name: Mindwarper
text: Mindwarper enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mindwarper: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Mob Justice
text: Mob Justice deals damage to target player equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor: A single stone can start an avalanche.

name: Mogg Bombers
text: When another creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Mogg Bombers and it deals 3 damage to target player.
flavor: Behind every great mogg bomber is another mogg with a shovel and a basket.

name: Mogg Flunkies
text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
flavor: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

name: Mogg Infestation
text: Destroy all creatures target player controls. For each creature that died this way, put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield under that player's control.

name: Mogg Maniac
text: Whenever Mogg Maniac is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.
flavor: Stand clear if he gets an itch.

name: Morgue Thrull
text: Sacrifice Morgue Thrull: Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.
flavor: It's so hard to find good help these days.

name: Mortuary
text: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put that card on top of your library.
flavor: "Think of them not as failures but as works in progress."\n—Volrath

name: Mox Diamond
text: If Mox Diamond would enter the battlefield, you may discard a land card instead. If you do, put Mox Diamond onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

name: Mulch
text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor: Hope is the one crop that can grow in any climate.

name: Nomads en-Kor
text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Nomads en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor: The Kor forsake roots for the winding of the path; forsake voices for the silence of the mind; forsake all else for the poverty of isolation.

name: Overgrowth
text: Enchant land (Target a land as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that land.)\nWhenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G}{G} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
flavor: Life needs no encouragement.

name: Portcullis
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if there are two or more other creatures on the battlefield, exile that creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control when Portcullis leaves the battlefield.

name: Primal Rage
text: Creatures you control have trample. (If a creature you control would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
flavor: "Charge!" A great cry went out, and countless elves and Vec soldiers charged up the mountain. Their fury and passion hid the fact that they were horribly outnumbered.

name: Provoke
text: Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Mirri did not have time to think, only to react.

name: Pursuit of Knowledge
text: If you would draw a card, you may put a study counter on Pursuit of Knowledge instead.\nRemove three study counters from Pursuit of Knowledge, Sacrifice Pursuit of Knowledge: Draw seven cards.

name: Rabid Rats
text: {T}: Target blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Every sentence in Volrath's prisons ends the same way.

name: Ransack
text: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. Put any number of them on the bottom of that library in any order and the rest on top of the library in any order.

name: Rebound
text: Change the target of target spell that targets only a player. The new target must be a player.
flavor: Insult, like an arrow, is beyond control once loosed.

name: Reins of Power
text: Untap all creatures you control and all creatures target opponent controls. You and that opponent each gain control of all creatures the other controls until end of turn. Those creatures gain haste until end of turn.

name: Revenant
text: Flying\nRevenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor: "Not again."\n—Hans

name: Rolling Stones
text: Wall creatures can attack as though they didn't have defender.
flavor: Walls collapse and kill people all the time. Some are just more aggressive about it.

name: Ruination
text: Destroy all nonbasic lands.
flavor: "We have built a wall upon sand. The wall will vanish. The sand will remain."\n—Oracle en-Vec

name: Sacred Ground
text: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield.
flavor: "That which knows itself cannot be shaped to another's will."\n—Oracle en-Vec

name: Samite Blessing
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has "{T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, prevent that damage."
flavor: Knit bone, darn flesh,\nStitch skin, weave breath.\n—Samite healing ritual

name: Scapegoat
text: As an additional cost to cast Scapegoat, sacrifice a creature.\nReturn any number of target creatures you control to their owner's hand.
flavor: "Enjoy your deception, Vuel," Gerrard said as Volrath's features melted from the dead shapeshifter. "I'll count this one as practice."

name: Seething Anger
text: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nTarget creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

name: Serpent Warrior
text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
flavor: A hiss before dying.

name: Shaman en-Kor
text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Shaman en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.\n{1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that damage is dealt to Shaman en-Kor instead.

name: Shard Phoenix
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nSacrifice Shard Phoenix: Shard Phoenix deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.\n{R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Shifting Wall
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nShifting Wall enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor: "You'd almost think Volrath doesn't want me here."\n—Gerrard

name: Shock
text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Lightning tethers souls to the world.\n—Kor saying

name: Sift
text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
flavor: "Twice I have let the Legacy slip away. Never again."\n—Karn, silver golem

name: Silver Wyvern
text: Flying\n{U}: Change the target of target spell or ability that targets only Silver Wyvern. The new target must be a creature.

name: Skeleton Scavengers
text: Skeleton Scavengers enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.\nPay {1} for each +1/+1 counter on Skeleton Scavengers: Regenerate Skeleton Scavengers. When it regenerates this way, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Skyshroud Archer
text: {T}: Target creature with flying gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: In Rath, arrows are guided not by virtue but by necessity.

name: Skyshroud Falcon
text: Flying, vigilance
flavor: The falcon slits the sky to let the light drip through.\n—Kor saying

name: Skyshroud Troopers
text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
flavor: "We were not made for war. Like flowstone, Volrath shaped us to it."\n—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Sliver Queen
text: {2}: Put a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: Her children are ever part of her.

name: Smite
text: Destroy target blocked creature.
flavor: "You've got your childhood wish at last. Now you get to die."\n—Gerrard, to Volrath

name: Soltari Champion
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\nWhenever Soltari Champion attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Spike Breeder
text: Spike Breeder enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a 1/1 green Spike creature token onto the battlefield.

name: Spike Colony
text: Spike Colony enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Colony: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Spike Feeder
text: Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\nRemove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

name: Spike Soldier
text: Spike Soldier enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Soldier: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\nRemove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Soldier: Spike Soldier gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Spike Worker
text: Spike Worker enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Worker: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Spindrift Drake
text: Flying\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Spindrift Drake unless you pay {U}.
flavor: Sea brine for blood, washing foam for laughter.

name: Spined Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver becomes blocked, that Sliver gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
flavor: "Slivers are evil and slivers are sly;\nAnd if you get eaten, then no one will cry."\n—Mogg children's rhyme

name: Spined Wurm
flavor: "As it moved, the wurm's spines gathered up bits of flowstone, which took the shapes of dead villagers' heads. Each head spoke a single sound, but if taken together, they said, ‘Alas for the living.'"\n—Dal myth of the wurm

name: Spirit en-Kor
text: Flying\n{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Spirit en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor: Death free throat from thirst, mouth from speech, feet from earth.\n—Kor requiem

name: Spitting Hydra
text: Spitting Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.\n{1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spitting Hydra: Spitting Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature.

name: Stronghold Assassin
text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor: The assassin sees only throats and hears only heartbeats.

name: Stronghold Taskmaster
text: Other black creatures get -1/-1.
flavor: "With the completion of each joyous task, we are closer to Yawgmoth's divine vision."\n—Stronghold architect, journal

name: Sword of the Chosen
text: {T}: Target legendary creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: One shard of Selenia yet remained.

name: Temper
text: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
flavor: "I don't need a plan, just a goal. The rest will follow on its own."\n—Gerrard

name: Tempting Licid
text: {G}, {T}: Tempting Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {G} to end this effect.\nAll creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

name: Thalakos Deceiver
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\nWhenever Thalakos Deceiver attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, gain control of target creature. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Tidal Surge
text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
flavor: "It is nature that gives us our boundaries and nature that enforces them."\n—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Tidal Warrior
text: {T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.
flavor: The tide of battle favors those who can swim.

name: Torment
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets -3/-0.
flavor: "Volrath has killed me. All that remains of me is the scar!"\n—Tahngarth

name: Tortured Existence
text: {B}, Discard a creature card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "There are terrors lurking in the unseen corners of us all."\n—Crovax

name: Venerable Monk
text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

name: Verdant Touch
text: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nTarget land becomes a 2/2 creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Victual Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: You gain 4 life."
flavor: "We are kinfolk," explained Karn to the sliver queen. "Just as you need your progeny to complete you, so do I need the pieces of the Legacy to make me whole."

name: Volrath's Gardens
text: {2}, Tap an untapped creature you control: You gain 2 life. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor: "Watch yourself," warned Starke. "These plants aren't nice when they're hungry."

name: Volrath's Laboratory
text: As Volrath's Laboratory enters the battlefield, choose a color and a creature type.\n{5}, {T}: Put a 2/2 creature token of the chosen color and type onto the battlefield.

name: Volrath's Shapeshifter
text: As long as the top card of your graveyard is a creature card, Volrath's Shapeshifter has the full text of that card and has the text "{2}: Discard a card." (Volrath's Shapeshifter has that card's name, mana cost, color, types, abilities, power, and toughness.)\n{2}: Discard a card.

name: Volrath's Stronghold
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{1}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor: The seed of a world's evil.

name: Walking Dream
text: Walking Dream can't be blocked.\nWalking Dream doesn't untap during your untap step if an opponent controls two or more creatures.
flavor: Dreams, by definition, live shorter lives than those who dream them.

name: Wall of Blossoms
text: Defender\nWhen Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: Each flower identical, every leaf and petal disturbingly exact.

name: Wall of Essence
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nWhenever Wall of Essence is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.
flavor: The ceiling and the floor fell in love, but only the wall knew.\n—Dal saying

name: Wall of Razors
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nFirst strike
flavor: "In this blessed structure let the very walls baptize themselves in the blood of intruders."\n—Stronghold architect, journal

name: Wall of Souls
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nWhenever Wall of Souls is dealt combat damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.
flavor: "It is the nature of evil to turn you against yourself."\n—Starke

name: Wall of Tears
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nWhenever Wall of Tears blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat.
flavor: "Many have been lost to pity."\n—Karn, silver golem

name: Warrior Angel
text: Flying\nWhenever Warrior Angel deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor: She represents not hope, but hope's desperate fury.

name: Warrior en-Kor
text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Warrior en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor: Only a matter as vital as destroying Volrath could bring together the reclusive Kor people.

name: Youthful Knight
text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor: "Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die."\n—Oracle en-Vec
